Name: Weak Roar
Description: Temporarily immobilizes you.

Name: Strong Roar
Description: Temporarily immobilizes you.

Name: Minor Tremor
Description: Temporarily immobilizes you.

Name: Major Tremor
Description: Temporarily immobilizes you.

Name: Minor Wind Pressure
Description: Temporarily immobilizes you.

Name: Major Wind Pressure
Description: Temporarily immobilizes you.

Name: Dragon Wind Pressure
Description: Temporarily immobilizes you.

Name: Fireblight
Description:
Temporarily causes your health
to deplete. Evading repeatedly
removes the condition.

Name: Waterblight
Description:
Temporarily slows down stamina
recovery. Evading repeatedly
removes the condition.

Name: Thunderblight
Description:
Temporarily makes you easier to
stun. Evading repeatedly removes
the condition.

Name: Iceblight
Description:
Temporarily increases stamina
consumption. Evading repeatedly
removes the condition.

Name: Dragonblight
Description:
Temporarily negates weapon
elements/ailments. Evading
repeatedly removes the condition.

Name: Poison
Description:
Temporarily causes your health
to deplete.

Name: Noxious Poison
Description:
Temporarily causes your health
to deplete. Effects are more
severe than ordinary poison.

Name: Stun
Description:
Temporarily immobilizes you.
Moving, pressing buttons, or
taking a hit removes the condition.

Name: Flash
Description:
Temporarily immobilizes you.
Moving, pressing buttons, or
taking a hit removes the condition.

Name: Paralysis
Description:
Temporarily immobilizes you.
Moving, pressing buttons, or
taking a hit removes the condition.

Name: Sleep
Description:
Temporarily puts you to sleep,
immobilizing you.

Name: Webbed
Description:
Temporarily immobilizes you.
Moving, pressing buttons, or
taking a hit removes the condition.

Name: Blastblight
Description:
Triggers an explosion after a
period of time elapses, or if you
take a hit that causes knockback.

Name: Defense Down
Description: Temporarily reduces your defense.

Name: Resistance Down
Description:
Temporarily lowers all your
resistances.

Name: Stench
Description:
Temporarily prevents the use of
health or stamina recovery items.

Name: Bleeding
Description:
Depletes health when moving.
Crouching or holding still for
a while removes the condition.

Name: Frenzy
Description:
If the Frenzy Virus fully infects
you, you will temporarily take
more damage.

Name: Frostblight
Description:
Temporarily immobilizes you.
Moving, pressing buttons, or taking
a hit removes the condition.
